Articles.Content: Footprints and/or rover tracks are a wonderful feature missing from the game, and that haven't been modded yet for KSP 1.1.2 specifically. I request a dedicated footprints/rover tracks mod (the outdated 1.0.5 version of Kopernicus Expansion has footprints, so it is possible, but that mod is anything but dedicated to only footprints) for KSP 1.1.2.
Any known update on this subject?

yo Guys i posted @MrHappyFaceif everythings run good, a friend and me is trying to recompile this beauty

but no promises it will need much much time so i had no coding xp and the friend less time

but if a smart modder read this and is willing to help resurect this FOOTPRINTS feel welcome to give hints,tips,suggestions

so wish us luck and push your dumbs,maybe before chrismas ,maybe not

PEACE kan

and big thx to the ksp community and squad
